title: Revealed: KPMG's secret AECOM team talks
text:
KPMG held secret talks to pinch a bunch of potential recruits from global engineering firm AECOM.

It is understood KPMG had its eyes on a group of digital assets specialists at AECOM and strategised about the best way to effect a bulk hiring.

Sources said the AECOM experts had approached KPMG, however talks broke down earlier this month.

KPMG. Ryan Stuart

The stealth move - had it come off - could've seen KPMG nab about 20 recruits, including a handful of senior operatives along with their rank and file staff.

Sources said KPMG was well aware of its need to act quickly and confidentiality and devise a strategy to make sure it didn't trigger contractual obligations around non-solicitation and non-compete agreements.
description: KPMG held secret talks to pinch a bunch of potential recruits from global engineering firm AECOM.
